title: Miley Cyrus
summary: Miley Ray Cyrus (/ˈmaɪli/ MY-lee; born Destiny Hope Cyrus, November 23, 1992) is an American singer, songwriter, and actress. Known for her distinctive raspy voice,[5][6] her music incorporates elements of varied styles and genres, including pop, country pop, hip hop, experimental, and rock. Cyrus has attained the most US Billboard 200 top-five albums in the 21st century by a female artist, with a total of thirteen entries. Her personal life, public image, and performances have been often the subject of controversy and widespread media coverage.
